verses.verse: In the beginning <S%H7225><s%> God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and <S%H853><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the earth <S%H776><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> waste <S%H8414><s%> and void <S%H922><s%>; and darkness <S%H2822><s%> was upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%>: and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> moved <S%H7363><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let there be <S%H1961><s%> light <S%H216><s%>: and there was light <S%H216><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the light <S%H216><s%>, that <S%H3588><s%> it was good <S%H2896><s%>: and God <S%H430><s%> divided <S%H914><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from <S%H996><s%> the darkness <S%H2822><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> Day <S%H3117><s%>, and the darkness <S%H2822><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> Night <S%H3915><s%>. And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning <S%H1242><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let there be a firmament <S%H7549><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and let it divide <S%H914><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%>, and divided <S%H914><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were under <S%H8478><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were above <S%H5921><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%>: and it was so <S%H3651><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%> Heaven <S%H8064><s%>. And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning <S%H1242><s%>, a second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> under the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be gathered together <S%H6960><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, and let the dry <S%H3004><s%> land appear <S%H7200><s%>: and it was so.

And God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the dry <S%H3004><s%> land Earth <S%H776><s%>; and the gathering together <S%H4723><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> he Seas <S%H3220><s%>: and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let the earth <S%H776><s%> put forth <S%H1876><s%> grass <S%H1877><s%>, herbs <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, and fruit-trees <S%H6086><s%> bearing <S%H6213><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, wherein <S%H834><s%> is the seed <S%H2233><s%> thereof <S%H776><s%>, upon the earth: and it was so.

And the earth <S%H776><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> grass <S%H1877><s%>, herbs <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, and trees <S%H6086><s%> bearing <S%H6213><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%>, wherein is the seed <S%H2233><s%> thereof <S%H4327><s%>, after their kind: and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.
And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning <S%H1242><s%>, a third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let there be lights <S%H3974><s%> in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> to divide <S%H914><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> from the night <S%H3915><s%>; and let them be for signs <S%H226><s%>, and for seasons <S%H4150><s%>, and for days <S%H3117><s%> and years <S%H8141><s%>:
and let them be for lights <S%H3974><s%> in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>: and it was so.

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> lights <S%H3974><s%>; the greater <S%H1419><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%>, and the lesser <S%H6996><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%>: he made the stars also <S%H3556><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> them in the firmament of heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>,

and to rule <S%H4910><s%> over the day <S%H3117><s%> and over the night <S%H3915><s%>, and to divide <S%H914><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from the darkness <S%H2822><s%>: and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.
And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning <S%H1242><s%>, a fourth <S%H7243><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> swarm <S%H8317><s%> with swarms <S%H8317><s%> of living <S%H2416><s%> creatures <S%H5315><s%>, and let birds <S%H5775><s%> fly <S%H5774><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> firmament <S%H7549><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> sea-monsters <S%H8577><s%>, and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moveth <S%H7430><s%>, wherewith the waters <S%H4325><s%> swarmed <S%H8317><s%>, after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, and every winged <S%H3671><s%> bird <S%H5775><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>: and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and let birds <S%H5775><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning <S%H1242><s%>, a fifth <S%H2549><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let the earth <S%H776><s%> bring forth <S%H3318><s%> living <S%H2416><s%> creatures <S%H5315><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, cattle <S%H929><s%>, and creeping things <S%H7431><s%>, and beasts of the earth <S%H776><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>: and it was so.

And God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, and everything that creepeth <S%H7431><s%> upon the ground <S%H127><s%> after its kind <S%H4327><s%>: and God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let us make <S%H6213><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in our image <S%H6754><s%>, after our likeness <S%H1823><s%>: and let them have dominion <S%H7287><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and over the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and over the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and over all the earth <S%H776><s%>, and over every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in his own image <S%H6754><s%>, in the image <S%H6754><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> he him <S%H2145><s%>; male and female <S%H5347><s%> created he them <S%H1254><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them <S%H430><s%>: and God said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H6509><s%>, Be fruitful, and multiply <S%H7235><s%>, and replenish <S%H4390><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and subdue it <S%H3533><s%>; and have dominion <S%H7287><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and over the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and over every living thing <S%H2416><s%> that moveth <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H2009><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> you every herb <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, which is upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>, and every tree <S%H6086><s%>, in which is the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of a tree <S%H6086><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>; to you it shall be <S%H1961><s%> for food <S%H402><s%>:

and to every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and to every bird <S%H5775><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and to everything that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, wherein there is life <S%H2416><s%>, I have given every green <S%H3418><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> for food <S%H402><s%>: and it was so.

And God <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> everything that <S%H834><s%> he had made <S%H6213><s%>, and <S%H3966><s%>, behold, it was very good <S%H2896><s%>. And there was evening <S%H6153><s%> and there was morning <S%H1242><s%>, the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.
